Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: (getdate())

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DECLARE @AllFiles nvarchar(max)
SET @AllFiles = '' DECLARE @FileName nvarchar(50) DECLARE l_cursor CURSOR FOR SELECT [FileName] FROM [Document] WHERE MedicalTestID=@MedicalTestID ORDER BY AddedDate OPEN l_cursor FETCH NEXT FROM l_cursor INTO @FileName WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN IF @AllFiles = '' BEGIN SET @AllFiles = @FileName END ELSE BEGIN SET @AllFiles = @AllFiles + ',' + @FileName END FETCH NEXT FROM l_cursor INTO @FileName END CLOSE l_cursor DEALLOCATE l_cursor
RETURN @AllFiles
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DELETE Document WHERE DocumentID = @DocumentID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
BEGIN TRANSACTION DeleteMedicalTestFullInfo
DELETE Document WHERE MedicalTestID = @MedicalTestID
DELETE MedicalTest WHERE MedicalTestID = @MedicalTestID
COMMIT TRANSACTION DeleteMedicalTestFullInfo
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DELETE MedicalTestType WHERE MedicalTestTypeID = @MedicalTestTypeID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DELETE Medication WHERE MedicationID = @MedicationID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DECLARE @MedicationID int
SELECT @MedicationID = MedicationID FROM MedicationFlow WHERE MedicationFlowID = @MedicationFlowID
DELETE MedicationFlow WHERE MedicationFlowID = @MedicationFlowID
exec dbo.sp_UpdateMedicationCountInStock @MedicationID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DELETE MedicationForm WHERE MedicationFormID = @MedicationFormID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
BEGIN TRANSACTION DeletePatientFullInfo
DELETE Document FROM Document d INNER JOIN MedicalTest ON d.MedicalTestID = MedicalTest.MedicalTestID INNER JOIN Visit ON MedicalTest.VisitID = Visit.VisitID WHERE Visit.PatientID = @PatientID
DELETE MedicalTest FROM MedicalTest mt INNER JOIN Visit ON mt.VisitID = Visit.VisitID WHERE Visit.PatientID = @PatientID
DELETE Visit WHERE PatientID = @PatientID
DELETE FROM [dbo].[Patient] WHERE PatientID = @PatientID
COMMIT TRANSACTION DeletePatientFullInfo
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
BEGIN TRANSACTION DeleteVisitFullInfo
DELETE Document FROM Document d INNER JOIN MedicalTest ON d.MedicalTestID = MedicalTest.MedicalTestID WHERE MedicalTest.VisitID = @VisitID
DELETE MedicalTest WHERE VisitID = @VisitID
DELETE Visit WHERE VisitID = @VisitID
COMMIT TRANSACTION DeleteVisitFullInfo
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DECLARE @DocumentID int
INSERT INTO [dbo].[Document] ([MedicalTestID] ,[FileName] ,AddedDate) VALUES ( @MedicalTestID, @FileName, GETDATE() )
SET @DocumentID = (SELECT @@Identity) RETURN ISNULL(@DocumentID, 0)
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DECLARE @MedicalTestID int
INSERT INTO [dbo].[MedicalTest] ([MedicalTestTypeID] ,[VisitID] ,[Date]) VALUES (@MedicalTestTypeID ,@VisitID ,@Date)
SET @MedicalTestID = (SELECT @@Identity) RETURN ISNULL(@MedicalTestID, 0)
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DECLARE @PatientID int
INSERT INTO [dbo].[Patient] ([FirstName] ,[LastName] ,[MiddleName] ,[Birthday] ,[Notes] ,Education ,WorkPosition ,Phone ,FinancialNotes) VALUES (@FirstName ,@LastName ,@MiddleName ,@Birthday ,@Notes ,@Education ,@WorkPosition ,@Phone ,@FinancialNotes)
SET @PatientID = (SELECT @@Identity) RETURN ISNULL(@PatientID, 0) END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT DocumentID, [FileName], '' AS DeleteColumn FROM [Document] WHERE MedicalTestID = @MedicalTestID ORDER BY AddedDate
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT * FROM [dbo].[MedicalTest] WHERE MedicalTestID = @MedicalTestID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT MedicalTest.MedicalTestID, MedicalTest.MedicalTestTypeID, dbo.fx_GetAllFilesByMedicalTestID(MedicalTest.MedicalTestID) AS AllFiles, MedicalTest.Date, MedicalTestType.Name AS MedicalTestTypeName, '' AS DeleteColumn FROM MedicalTest INNER JOIN MedicalTestType ON MedicalTest.MedicalTestTypeID = MedicalTestType.MedicalTestTypeID WHERE MedicalTest.VisitID = @VisitID ORDER BY MedicalTest.Date DESC
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT * FROM MedicalTestType WHERE MedicalTestTypeID = @MedicalTestTypeID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT *, '' AS DeleteColumn FROM MedicalTestType ORDER BY Name END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_SelectMedicalTestTypeList] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT Medication.*, Medication.Name + ' - ' + MedicationForm.Name AS MedicationFullName FROM Medication INNER JOIN MedicationForm ON Medication.MedicationFormID = MedicationForm.MedicationFormID WHERE Medication.MedicationID = @MedicationID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DECLARE @MedicationCount int
SET @MedicationCount = 0
SELECT @MedicationCount = Count(MedicationID) FROM Medication
RETURN @MedicationCount
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_SelectMedicationCount] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT * FROM MedicationFlow WHERE MedicationFlowID = @MedicationFlowID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DECLARE @MedicationFlowCount int
SET @MedicationFlowCount = 0
SELECT @MedicationFlowCount = Count(MedicationID) FROM MedicationFlow WHERE MedicationID = @MedicationID
RETURN @MedicationFlowCount
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT MedicationFlow.*, MedicationFlowType.Name AS MedicationFlowTypeName, '' AS DeleteColumn FROM MedicationFlow INNER JOIN MedicationFlowType ON MedicationFlow.MedicationFlowTypeID = MedicationFlowType.MedicationFlowTypeID WHERE MedicationFlow.MedicationID = @MedicationID ORDER BY MedicationFlow.Date DESC OFFSET @Offset ROWS FETCH NEXT @CountRows ROWS ONLY
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT * FROM MedicationFlowType ORDER BY MedicationFlowType.Name
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_SelectMedicationFlowTypeList] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT * FROM MedicationForm WHERE MedicationFormID = @MedicationFormID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT *, '' AS DeleteColumn FROM MedicationForm ORDER BY Name
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_SelectMedicationFormList] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT Medication.*, MedicationForm.Name AS MedicationFormName, Medication.Name + ' - ' + MedicationForm.Name AS MedicationFullName FROM Medication INNER JOIN MedicationForm ON Medication.MedicationFormID = MedicationForm.MedicationFormID WHERE Medication.Name LIKE @Name + '%' OR @Name = '' ORDER BY Medication.Name
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT Medication.*, MedicationForm.Name AS MedicationFormName, '' AS DeleteColumn FROM Medication INNER JOIN MedicationForm ON Medication.MedicationFormID = MedicationForm.MedicationFormID ORDER BY Medication.Name OFFSET @Offset ROWS FETCH NEXT @CountRows ROWS ONLY
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT Medication.*, MedicationForm.Name AS MedicationFormName FROM Medication INNER JOIN MedicationForm ON Medication.MedicationFormID = MedicationForm.MedicationFormID WHERE CountInStock <> 0 ORDER BY Medication.Name
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_SelectMedicationWarehouseList] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT * FROM [dbo].[Patient] WHERE PatientID = @PatientID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT *, '' AS DeleteColumn FROM [dbo].[Patient] WHERE FirstName LIKE @FirstName + '%' AND LastName LIKE @LastName + '%'
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT * FROM [dbo].[Visit] WHERE VisitID = @VisitID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT [VisitID] ,[Date] ,[Anamnesis] ,[Prescription] ,'' AS DeleteColumn FROM [dbo].[Visit] WHERE PatientID = @PatientID ORDER BY [Date] DESC
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
UPDATE [dbo].[MedicalTest] SET [MedicalTestTypeID] = @MedicalTestTypeID ,[Date] = @Date WHERE MedicalTestID = @MedicalTestID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
UPDATE MedicalTestType SET Name = @Name WHERE MedicalTestTypeID = @MedicalTestTypeID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
UPDATE Medication SET Name = @Name, MedicationFormID = @MedicationFormID WHERE MedicationID = @MedicationID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DECLARE @CountInStock int, @CountGave int
SET @CountGave = 0 SET @CountInStock = 0
SELECT @CountInStock = ISNULL(SUM(Count), 0) FROM MedicationFlow WHERE MedicationID = @MedicationID AND MedicationFlowTypeID = 1
SELECT @CountGave = ISNULL(SUM(Count), 0) FROM MedicationFlow WHERE MedicationID = @MedicationID AND MedicationFlowTypeID = 2
SET @CountInStock = @CountInStock - @CountGave
UPDATE Medication SET CountInStock = @CountInStock WHERE MedicationID = @MedicationID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DECLARE @PrevMedicationID int
SELECT @PrevMedicationID = MedicationID FROM MedicationFlow WHERE MedicationFlowID = @MedicationFlowID
UPDATE MedicationFlow SET MedicationFlowTypeID = @MedicationFlowTypeID, MedicationID = @MedicationID, [Count] = @Count, [Date] = @Date, Note = @Note WHERE MedicationFlowID = @MedicationFlowID
IF @PrevMedicationID <> @MedicationID BEGIN exec dbo.sp_UpdateMedicationCountInStock @PrevMedicationID END
exec dbo.sp_UpdateMedicationCountInStock @MedicationID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
UPDATE MedicationForm SET Name = @Name WHERE MedicationFormID = @MedicationFormID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
UPDATE [dbo].[Patient] SET [FirstName] = @FirstName ,[LastName] = @LastName ,[MiddleName] = @MiddleName ,[Birthday] = @Birthday ,[Notes] = @Notes ,Education = @Education ,WorkPosition = @WorkPosition ,Phone = @Phone ,FinancialNotes = @FinancialNotes WHERE PatientID = @PatientID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
UPDATE [dbo].[Visit] SET [Date] = @Date ,[Anamnesis] = @Anamnesis ,[Prescription] = @Prescription WHERE VisitID = @VisitID
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
